iterations.descript: how many times the blur operation is applied (higher number gives better results but is more resource intensive)

base.descript: base (each iteration increases the blur, the base controlls how much more the amount is increased for each iteration)

Feedback.feedback1: Documentations take a lot of time and effort. Unfortunately both are scarce ressources.
Feedback.feedback2: If you would like to have more info about this node please drop a note. It helps to set priorities according to the user needs...
